name: Audio
description: Visualize music on the wallpaper. Includes a media player widget for controlling audio on the desktop. Automatically syncs to the current playing media (including YouTube, Spotify, videos, etc.).
author: Octos

name: Contraption
author: Octos
description: A complete physics sandbox, right on your desktop. From cars to bridges, make complex machines and contraptions then let them run wild on your desktop.

name: Conway
description: A simple mouse-interactive visualization for Conway's Game of Life.
author: squiemperor

name: Layout
author: Octos
description: Choose an image/video to set as your wallpaper and customize it with interactive widgets.

name: Eyes on the Solar System
author: NASA
description: Explore planets, moons, asteroids, comets, and spacecraft in 3D. From eyes.nasa.gov

name: Terminal
author: Octos
description: A digital clock with a live old TV effect and customizable 3D text art.

name: Terrain
author: Octos
description: A nice scrolling terrain. Click to draw.

name: Webpage
author: Octos
description: Load any webpage as your wallpaper.
